description:
You may be aware of pip & virtualenv for installing and maintaining your
software libraries.

You may not be aware of the fantastic conda project.

It is not limited only to installing python software, also handles
installing python itself, and has environments that isolate your code
similar to virtualenv.

Come find out this project which has been gaining enthusiastic support
in the Scientific Python community.
title: Conda: a cross-platform, python-agnostic binary package manager.
